data.message: Any good day is going on to Facebook and seeing the burning alive of a cat because FB won't remove it.. Oh wait

replies.message: Hi Carla. Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us with your concerns. It's possible that you come across something that you find uncomfortable or controversial but does not violate our rules. You can hide it from your view by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1sZdXxa. -Sarah

I can't see how an illegal act like animal cruelty can be routinely ignored. 

Facebook policies are so hypocritical it's laughable. Ban photos of cancer patients, heart surgery, mothers breast feeding but allow people to post a video of a kitten being set on fire by a bunch of evil thugs or a beheading by terrorist.

And by the time I've seen it, the damage is done, no point hiding it.
